summary.span: 命名空间提供在设计时对序列化进行自定义和控制的类型。

span.span: The namespace provides types that support customization and control of serialization at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间中的类可分为以下几类：The classes in this namespace can be divided into the following categories: - 序列化属性，可用于指示要用于特定类型的序列化程序： ，指示要用于特定类型的序列化程序; 和 ，指示要用于根设计器的基序列化程序。Serialization attributes that can be used to indicate the serializer to use for a specific type: , to indicate the serializer to use for a particular type; and , to indicate the base serializer to use for the root designer. - 设计器可用于自定义序列化的类： 、用于从序列化状态加载设计器文档; 以及 在涉及外部组件和异步加载时加载设计器文档。Classes that a designer can implement to customize serialization: , for loading a designer document from a serialized state; and , for loading a designer document when external components and asynchronous loading are involved. - 设计器可用于管理序列化过程的接口： ，用于注册或检索自定义序列化 程序; 以及使序列化程序可用于 ; 和 （提供调用序列化和反序列化的方法）。Interfaces that a designer can use to manage the serialization process: , to register or retrieve custom serializers; , to make a serializer available to an ; and , which provides methods to invoke serialization and deserialization. - 一个接口，可以实现该接口来自定义设计器的加载过程： 。An interface that can be implemented to customize the loading process of a designer: . - 一个接口，可用于优化设计器的重新加载： 。An interface that can be used to optimize the reloading of a designer: . - 其他帮助程序类： 、用于为对象生成唯一名称的接口; 、用于与序列化程序共享序列化上下文信息的数据结构; 以及 可以描述可序列化对象的对象。Other helper classes: , an interface for generating unique names for objects; , a data structure useful for sharing serialization context information with serializers; and , an object that can describe a serializable object.
